short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy To-do is a simple task management app that let's you add & manage tasks easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you manage your daily tasks and reminders quite efficiently, without having to worry about a lot of productivity apps stuck on your head. To get started, simply type in a task, choose a priority and click add. Done!
